G

getCurrentDrawContainer() - Method in interface github.lightningcreations.lcjei.IEngineInterface
Obtains a container, that when drawn to, draws to the same pane as the Engine is currently drawing to.
If the engine was initialized with a call to IEngineInterface.initialize(Container) for a non-null Container c, and that call returned true, then Container returns c or a child of c.
getCurrentDrawContainer() - Method in class github.lightningcreations.lcjei.wrapper.WrappedEngine
 
getEngineInterfaceClass() - Method in interface github.lightningcreations.lcjei.IGameInfo
Gets the class of the Engine Interface.
getGameClass() - Method in interface github.lightningcreations.lcjei.IGameInfo
Gets the actual class of the game this represents.
getGameId() - Method in interface github.lightningcreations.lcjei.IGameInfo
Gets the Unique Id of the game.
getGameInfo() - Method in interface github.lightningcreations.lcjei.IEngineInterface
Obtains information about the current game object.
This is an optional operation.
getGameObject() - Method in interface github.lightningcreations.lcjei.IEngineInterface
Gets the internal game object.
getGameObject() - Method in class github.lightningcreations.lcjei.wrapper.WrappedEngine
 
getGuestEngine() - Method in class github.lightningcreations.lcjei.wrapper.WrappedGame
Obtains and returns an interface to the guest Engine.
getGuestGame() - Method in class github.lightningcreations.lcjei.wrapper.WrappedGame
 
getHostEngine() - Method in class github.lightningcreations.lcjei.wrapper.WrappedGame
Obtains and returns an interface to the host Engine.
getHostGame() - Method in class github.lightningcreations.lcjei.wrapper.WrappedGame
 
getName() - Method in interface github.lightningcreations.lcjei.IGameInfo
Gets the Game's Name.
getVersion() - Method in interface github.lightningcreations.lcjei.IGameInfo
Gets the version of the game.
github.lightningcreations.lcjei - package github.lightningcreations.lcjei
Base Package for Lightning Creations Java Engine Interface.
github.lightningcreations.lcjei.wrapper - package github.lightningcreations.lcjei.wrapper
Package for wrapping games from multiple engines into another.
